original_text: Now I want to remind you, although you once fully knew it, that Jesus, who saved a people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed those who did not believe.
korean_text: 너희가 본래 모든 사실을 알고 있으나 내가 너희로 다시 생각나게 하고자 하노라 주께서 백성을 애굽에서 구원하여 내시고 후에 믿지 아니하는 자들을 멸하셨으며

sentences.original_text: Now I want to remind you
although you once fully knew it
who saved a people out of the land of Egypt
afterward destroyed those who did not believe
